turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Regarding referrals, clinic policy usually requires the referral to be received and processed *before* the appointment can be confirmed and attended, to ensure coverage. We can hold the spot for a short period, but it's best to confirm the referral is on its way.
